Room.Name: New Member's Office
Room.ShortDescription: An old woman stands up from her desk and asks how she might help you.
Room.LongDescription: All new members must come to this office before the goddess Artemis will accept them. The old lady tells you that the main chapel is located to the northwest down the main hall. In the chapel, the pulpit is towards the north and the prayer chamber is to the south. The door in the hallway to the north leads to the priestess' chambers, where she would be willing to train you in the ways of Artemis.
